title: Pset_ReinforcementBarPitchOfColumn
description: The pitch length information of reinforcement  bar with the column. The X and Y direction are based on the local coordinate system of building storey. The X and Y direction of the reinforcement bar are parallel to the X and Y axis of the IfcBuildingStorey's local coordinate system, respectively.

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: A descriptive label for the general reinforcement type.

ReinforcementBarType.title: ReinforcementBarType
ReinforcementBarType.description: Defines the type of the reinforcement bar.

HoopBarPitch.title: HoopBarPitch
HoopBarPitch.description: The pitch length of the hoop bar.

XDirectionTieHoopBarPitch.title: XDirectionTieHoopBarPitch
XDirectionTieHoopBarPitch.description: The X direction pitch length of the tie hoop.

XDirectionTieHoopCount.title: XDirectionTieHoopCount
XDirectionTieHoopCount.description: The number of bars with X direction tie hoop bars.

YDirectionTieHoopBarPitch.title: YDirectionTieHoopBarPitch
YDirectionTieHoopBarPitch.description: The Y direction pitch length of the tie hoop.

YDirectionTieHoopCount.title: YDirectionTieHoopCount
YDirectionTieHoopCount.description: The number of bars with Y direction tie hoop bars.
